description: Prints a value to the output.
name: print

description: Print but it's orange. Used for warnings.
name: warn

description: Attempts to convert a string to a number, returns nil if not possible.
name: tonumber

description: Converts a non-string value to a string representation. If value is a string, no operations are done and the same string is returned.
name: tostring

description: Returns the type of the value passed. For example, if value is a string, then the return will be string.
name: typeof

description: Returns the amount of seconds elapsed since the Epoch (January 1st, 1970 at 12:00 AM). Better known as epoch time or UNIX time.
name: tick

description: Waits for a specified amount of seconds. Does not return anything.
name: wait

description: Launches a function on a separate thread without waiting for it to finish. The function must be a variable name, for example spawn(myFunction)
name: spawn
